name: color
description: Represents a color

properties.name: hue
properties.description: Hue of this color, as an angle

properties.name: saturation
properties.description: Saturation (color intensity) of this color

properties.name: lightness
properties.description: Lightness of this color. Between 0 (black) and 1 (white).

properties.name: predefined
properties.description: Whether this is a predefined color. False if this is a user-defined color.

name: conversation
description: Represents an individual conversation with a persona

properties.name: thread id
properties.description: Id of the thread this conversation is part of

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this conversation was added to the database

properties.name: closed after
properties.description: Time when this conversation was closed the last time

name: conversation summary
description: Summarizes a conversation

properties.name: conversation id
properties.description: Id of the conversation this is a summary of

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this conversation summary was added to the database

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when this summary was replaced with a new version

name: conversation summary statement link
description: Links statements to conversation summaries in which they appear

properties.name: summary id
properties.description: Id of the linked conversation summary

properties.name: statement id
properties.description: Id of the statement made within the linked text / entity

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

properties.name: role
properties.description: Role of the linked statement in the linked summary

name: memory
description: Represents a memory recorded during a conversation

properties.name: message id
properties.description: Id of the message from which this memory was triggered

properties.name: archived after
properties.description: Time when this memory was archived

name: memory statement link
description: Links statements to memories in which they appear

properties.name: memory id
properties.description: Id of the memory where the linked statement appears

properties.name: statement id
properties.description: Id of the statement made within the linked text / entity

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

name: message
description: Represents a single message from the user or from a persona

properties.name: session id
properties.description: Id of the session during which this message was posted

properties.name: sender
properties.description: Role of the entity that sent this message

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this message was posted

name: message statement link
description: Links statements to messages where they appear

properties.name: message id
properties.description: Id of the message where the linked statement appears

properties.name: statement id
properties.description: Id of the statement made within the linked text / entity

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

name: session
description: Represents an individual user session within a conversation

properties.name: conversation id
properties.description: Id of the conversation active during this session

properties.name: started
properties.description: Time when this session started

properties.name: ended
properties.description: Time when this session ended. None while active.

name: session summary statement link
description: Links statements to session summaries in which they appear

properties.name: session id
properties.description: Id of the session being summarized

properties.name: statement id
properties.description: Id of the statement made within the linked text / entity

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

name: thread
description: Represents a single named sequence of conversations within a specific topic

properties.name: topic id
properties.description: Id of the general topic of this thread

properties.name: name
properties.description: The current name of this thread

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this thread was added to the database

properties.name: archived after
properties.description: Time when this thread was archived

name: topic
description: Represents a general conversation topic / theme, assigned to a single persona

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this topic was added to the database

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when this topic was archived

name: topic settings
description: Specifies the name of a topic and the persona with whom that topic is discussed

properties.name: topic id
properties.description: Id of the topic these settings describe

properties.name: persona id
properties.description: Id of the persona with whom this topic is discussed

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name assigned to this topic

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this topic settings was added to the database

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when these settings were replaced with another version

name: enum
description: Represents an enumeration

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of this enumeration (mutable)

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this enum was added to the database

properties.name: archived after
properties.description: Time when this enumeration was archived

name: enum value
description: Represents an individual enumeration value

properties.name: enum id
properties.description: Id of the enumeration where this value appears

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this enum value was added to the database

properties.name: archived after
properties.description: Time when this enumeration value was archived

name: enum value statement link
description: Common trait for links between statements and the texts where they are made

properties.name: enum value version id
properties.description: Id of the enumeration value version where the linked statement appears

properties.name: statement id
properties.description: Id of the statement made within the linked text / entity

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

name: enum value version
description: Represents a specific version of an enumeration value

properties.name: enum value id
properties.description: Id of the enumeration value which this version describes

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of this enumeration value

properties.name: color id
properties.description: Id of the color used for this enumeration value

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this enum value version was added to the database

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when this version was replaced with a newer one

name: instruction
description: Represents a behavioral instruction that may be given to an LLM

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this instruction was added to the database

name: instruction statement link
description: Attaches a statement to an instruction where that statement appears

properties.name: instruction version id
properties.description: Id of the instruction version where the linked statement is made

properties.name: statement id
properties.description: Id of the statement made within the linked text / entity

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

name: instruction targeting link
description: Links an instruction to some entity to which / where it applies

properties.name: target id
properties.description: Id of the entity to which or where the linked instruction applies

properties.name: instruction id
properties.description: Id of the instruction applied to the linked entity

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this instruction targeting link was added to the database

properties.name: removed after
properties.description: Time after which this link was removed

name: instruction version
description: Represents a specific instruction version. Different versions may have different configurations, syntax, etc.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of this instruction

properties.name: enum value id
properties.description: Id of the enumeration value selected by applying this instruction. None if not enumeration-based.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this instruction version was added to the database

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when this version was replaced with a new one

name: persona instruction link
description: Links an instruction to a persona to which it applies

properties.name: persona id
properties.description: Id of the persona to which the linked instruction applies

properties.name: instruction id
properties.description: Id of the instruction applied to the linked entity

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this instruction targeting link was added to the database

properties.name: removed after
properties.description: Time after which this link was removed

name: thread instruction link
description: Links an instruction to a thread where it applies

properties.name: thread id
properties.description: Id of the thread where the linked instruction applies

properties.name: instruction id
properties.description: Id of the instruction applied to the linked entity

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this instruction targeting link was added to the database

properties.name: removed after
properties.description: Time after which this link was removed

name: topic instruction link
description: Links an instruction to a topic where it applies

properties.name: topic id
properties.description: Id of the topic where the linked instruction applies

properties.name: instruction id
properties.description: Id of the instruction applied to the linked entity

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this instruction targeting link was added to the database

properties.name: removed after
properties.description: Time after which this link was removed

name: llm
description: Represents a large language model

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of this LLM in Ollama

properties.name: alias
properties.description: Alias given to this LLM

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this llm was added to the database

properties.name: removed after
properties.description: Time when this LLM was removed from this application

name: llm size variant
description: Represents a specific version (size) of a large language model

properties.name: llm id
properties.description: Id of the LLM this is a variant of

properties.name: suffix
properties.description: Suffix added to the end of the LLM's name when targeting this specific variant

properties.name: size
properties.description: Size of this LLM variant in billions of parameters. None if unknown.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this llm size variant was added to the database

properties.name: removed after
properties.description: Time when this specific variant was removed from this application

name: custom meta info
description: Represents a user-defined meta info field definition

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of this field

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value assigned to this field

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this custom meta info was added to the database

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when this version was replaced with another

name: meta info availability
description: Links a meta info field to a context where it is made available to a persona

properties.name: field id
properties.description: Id of the meta info -field made available

properties.name: context id
properties.description: Id of the context where the linked information is made available

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this information was made available

name: meta info field
description: Represents an individual meta info value that can be made available or unavailable

properties.name: automated content
properties.description: Automatically fillable value. None if this is not an automated field.

properties.name: custom info id
properties.description: Id of the customized information in this field. None if this is an automated field.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this meta info field was added to the database

properties.name: archived after
properties.description: Time when this field was archived, if applicable

name: persona info availability
description: A link that makes a meta info field available to a persona

properties.name: persona id
properties.description: Id of the persona to which the linked information is made available

properties.name: field id
properties.description: Id of the meta info -field made available

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this information was made available

name: thread info availability
description: A link that makes a meta info field available within a specific thread

properties.name: thread id
properties.description: Id of the thread where the linked information is made available

properties.name: field id
properties.description: Id of the meta info -field made available

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this information was made available

name: topic info availability
description: A link that makes a meta info field available within a specific topic

properties.name: topic id
properties.description: Id of the topic where the linked information is made available

properties.name: field id
properties.description: Id of the meta info -field made available

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this information was made available

name: animation emotion assignment
description: Contains an assessment of an animation's emotional expression

properties.name: animation id
properties.description: Id of the animation this assignment describes

properties.name: emotion
properties.description: Name of the emotion assigned to this animation

properties.name: origin llm id
properties.description: Id of the LLM (variant) which assigned this emotion. None if not assigned by a (known) LLM.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this animation emotion assignment was added to the database

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when this assignment was replaced or retracted

name: persona
description: Represents a personalized large language model

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this persona was added to the database

properties.name: deleted after
properties.description: Time when this persona was deleted

name: persona animation
description: Represents an individual animation representing some state of a Persona

properties.name: set id
properties.description: Id of the set to which this animation belongs

properties.name: relative sub directory
properties.description:
Path to the directory that contains image files specific to this animation. 
Relative to the image set's directory.

properties.name: default frame duration
properties.description:
Duration how long each frame will be shown by default. 
None if the common default should be used instead.

name: persona image
description: Represents an individual image / frame within a Persona animation

properties.name: animation id
properties.description: Id of the animation this image is part of

properties.name: file name
properties.description: Name of the wrapped image file

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index of this image within its animation

properties.name: custom duration
properties.description:
Duration how long this image / frame should be displayed at once. 
None if the default duration should be applied.

name: persona image set
description: Represents a set of images used for visualizing a Persona

properties.name: relative directory
properties.description:
Path to the directory that contains the images used in this image set. 
Relative to the main image directory.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this persona image set was added to the database

properties.name: removed after
properties.description: Time when this image set was removed or deleted

name: persona image set link
description: Links a Persona with an image set used for that Persona

properties.name: persona id
properties.description: Id of the persona for which the linked images are used

properties.name: image set id
properties.description: Id of the image set used for the linked persona

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this persona image set link was added to the database

properties.name: removed after
properties.description: Time when this link was removed

name: persona parameter
description: Represents an individual parameter / option assignment which is tied to a persona (version)

properties.name: settings id
properties.description: Id of the persona settings this parameter assignment is part of

properties.name: key
properties.description: Name / key of the adjusted parameter

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value assigned to this parameter

name: persona settings
description: Records general settings (version) for a Persona

properties.name: persona id
properties.description: Id of the persona which these settings describe

properties.name: llm variant id
properties.description: Id of the LLM variant this persona wraps

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name assigned for this persona

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this persona settings was added to the database

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when these settings were replaced with a new version

name: persona statement link
description: Links a statement to a Persona description

properties.name: persona settings id
properties.description: Id of the settings to which this link is tied to

properties.name: statement id
properties.description: Id of the statement made within the linked text / entity

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

properties.name: description type
properties.description: Context in which the linked statement appears

name: statement link
description: Common trait for links between statements and the texts where they are made

properties.name: statement id
properties.description: Id of the statement made within the linked text / entity

properties.name: parent id
properties.description: Id of the text where the placed text appears

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

name: text placement
description: Places some type of text to some location within another text

properties.name: parent id
properties.description: Id of the text where the placed text appears

properties.name: placed id
properties.description: Id of the text that is placed within the parent text

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text
